Package com.playground.playground.interface_adapater.controller

Class DataAttributesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.playground.playground.interface_adapater.controller.DataAttributesController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class DataAttributesController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This controller handles all the dataset related options on the UI.
